articles.title: NASA Releases Images of Solar Flares on the Sun - Galaxy Reporters
articles.description: A massive solar flare erupted from the surface of the Sun earlier this week. The X-class flare is just the latest eruption from the Sun that has captured NASA’s attention. This time, though, NASA managed to capture an image of the solar flare as it happened. …
